mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_COLLECT WHERE SHARE_ID = #{shareId} AND USER_ID = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT S.ID AS id, U.`NAME` AS username, I.AVATAR_URL AS userAvatarUrl, S.TIME AS time, S.CONTENT AS content, S.LIKENUM AS likeNum, S.COLLECTNUM AS collectNum, S.COMMENTNUM AS commentNum FROM T_SHARE AS S,T_USER AS U,T_USER_INFO AS I,T_COLLECT AS C,T_USER AS SU WHERE S.USER_ID=U.ID AND U.ID=I.USER_ID AND C.SHARE_ID=S.ID AND C.USER_ID=#{userId} AND S.STATE='public' AND S.USER_ID=SU.ID AND SU.LOCKED=0 ORDER BY C.COLLECT_TIME DESC;
